features: ★【Heavy Duty&Stability】High-strength aluminum alloy double-row tube and 60mm bowl base provide better stability .The mid-level spreaders keep the legs from collapsing on uneven ground and add stability with adjustable rubber mats.

★【Professional Fluid Head】The head can rotate 360° horizontally.The built-in damping and dynamic balancing system make fluid head operated smooth,can tilt +90°/-75°vertically and the max load is 13.2 lbs.

★【Multifunctional Quick Release Plate】With 1/4” and spare 3/8” screw, perfect for most brands of the cameras and camcorders like canon, nikon, sony. A safety button on the left side of fluid head avoids equipment falling down.
★【Easy Set Up& Pack】Humanized tube flip locking system,lock and loose is more convenient and fast.Tube lock make fold more quickly.
★【Product Features】Tilt range: -75°to +90° | Pan range: 360 °| 60mm Ball Diameter | Adjustable height: 35.6" to 72 " | Max Load: 13.2 lbs
★★★If there are any doubts and questions, please send an email to us, we will help you deal with the problem at the first time!

reviews.reviewerName: Kamal Jabbar CEO Palace Music Group, LLC
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Professional Quality Meets Affordability: Heavy Duty Tripod Delivers Outstanding Value"
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired this tripod to complement my Canon M50, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The build quality is truly impressive, and it's evident that this tripod is designed for professional use. It provides the stability and sturdiness I need to capture smooth and shake-free shots, even in challenging conditions.Setting up this tripod is a breeze thanks to its user-friendly tube flip locking system. It's quick and convenient, which is crucial when time is of the essence on a shoot. The fluid head is a standout feature, allowing for 360-degree horizontal rotation and smooth operation. The dynamic balancing system ensures my pans and tilts are consistently fluid.What I appreciate most about this tripod is that it accommodates various camera brands, including my Canon M50, with its multifunctional quick release plate. The safety button on the fluid head adds an extra layer of security, giving me peace of mind during shoots.5 Stars Review for Light WeightThis Heavy Duty Tripod is a fantastic blend of strength and lightweight design. Despite its heavy-duty capabilities, it's surprisingly easy to transport and set up. This is especially important when I'm on location, as it means less strain on my shoulders and more convenience. So, a solid 5-star rating for its light weight.5 Stars Review for SturdinessSturdiness is where this tripod truly excels. Its high-strength aluminum alloy double-row tube and 60mm bowl base provide exceptional stability, ensuring my camera and equipment stay secure even in challenging shooting conditions. The mid-level spreaders and adjustable rubber mats add to its stability, and I've never had to worry about my gear collapsing on uneven terrain. An easy 5-star rating for its rock-solid sturdiness.5 Stars Review for Value for MoneyThis tripod offers professional-level features and build quality at a price that won't break the bank. It's an excellent value for money, especially when compared to other high-end tripods on the market. The quality and performance it delivers make it a worthwhile investment for any serious photographer or videographer. A definite 5-star rating for its exceptional value for money.Why I Like It:"I'm thoroughly impressed with this "Heavy Duty" Tripod. It meets and exceeds my expectations in terms of build quality, stability, and value for money. It has quickly become an essential tool in my photography and videography kit, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. I looked at many other tripods because I wanted to find one that was professional quality, heavy duty and priced at "fair" a value!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a cheap heavy duty tripod
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve had this for a few weeks and all I can say it’s great it’s sturdy with my 8 pound setup and the movement is really nice and easy to adjust for a cheap tripod I was very impressed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well they delivered it to my next door neighbor. I walked over and grabbed my package, no one was home I'm pretty sure I was captured on camera grabbing my box. I'll have to explain to them later I'm sure. On to the review. I love the case it came in. I was immediately impressed with the weight. It's heavy, so beware if you're looking for something lighter forget it. It appears to be made out of good material very sturdy. I've never had a tripod that extends so tall. I'm 6 foot 2 and this towers above me. So far I'm pleased. I will update you later after using it. Oh the latch that locks the legs was broke when I unpacked it. However a backup peice was included in the package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, smooth operating tripod.
reviews.reviewText: Not real light, but it can't be solid and stable without having some heft to it. I bought it for use with my 100 mm spotting scope which is very heavy and it works perfectly, just what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy. Difficult to raise and lower evenly.
reviews.reviewText: Holds my dose video camera plus teleprompter securely. When you need yo raise or lower, you have to raise it on all 3 legs, the double check the level to get it even. Make sure to put the plate in the right direction. It's difficult to get off if you insert it the wrong way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is exactly what I was looking for and works as advertised. I was looking for a very stable tripod to use with a large set of binoculars. This tripod is well made and very sturdy. I initially purchased an inexpensive, lightweight tripod which was very wobbly and nearly impossible to keep steady. This tripod is rock solid, highly adjustable, and overall very well made. It’s a little pricey, but well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A tripod with a major flaw
reviews.reviewText: I bought this after goofing around with the cheap, black, aluminum tripods for many years. This was my first "mid level" tripod and I have to say the extra money is well worth it for the most part. This tripod is easy to collapse and expand, has good height, has easy motion in every direction and is sturdy in most situations.However, this tripod has a fatal flaw. When you are filming in low temperatures (anything below 70 degrees Fahrenheit) the friction that is used to clamp the legs in place begins to decrease and the tripod can slowly start to slip and go down in height just from the weight of the camera on it. My camera only weighs about 2 or 3 pounds, so this is extremely bad. Even the most gentle touch can cause the legs to slip and drop to a lower position.This is particularly awful for outdoor shooting, because it is often windy, so the solution to that is to put some weight on the hook in the middle of the tripod to secure it, however, this weight causes the camera to quickly drop down.In other words, this tripod doesn't lock its height like it should. The "clamp" system that it uses for securing the legs is not adequate.I think this is a great buy for someone looking to up their video game.
Se pueden realizar varias combinaciones para adaptar el equipo a tripiés, zapatas, y equipo fotográfico en general, incluye adaptadores para tornillos de 3/8 y 1/4, muy útil.

reviews.reviewTitle: Heavy Duty Tripod Professional Video Tripod Aluminium 72inch with 360 Degree Fluid Head.
reviews.reviewText: The Heavy Duty Tripod Professional Video Tripod Aluminium 72inch with 360 Degree Fluid Head has worked beautifully with my video cameras. Fairly strong winds to do not move the tripod's stability nor does the remote camera fixtures jiggle the tripod. This tripod is not the top of the line Video Cam tripod; however, for its weight and structure, it is doing exactly what I need for outdoor camera work.

reviews.reviewerName: El producto llego a tiempo ya lo probe y funcionando al 100 buenas baterias para mi camara

La calidad me sorprendió, es mejor de lo que esperaba. Funcionalidad, manera de operar y precisión en el movimiento. Y además con excelente precio. Super recomendable
